alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 19 at 11:43AM PDT until March 20 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 8 PM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts 40 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Elko County, Southeastern Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 8 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Dangerous crosswinds, along with patchy blowing snow on higher passes and summits, could lead to difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
